mapper.select: create table if not exists District ( id PRIMARY KEY, name, longitude, latitude, border, unit_price, count, city_id, city_name );
mapper.insert:
insert or replace into District( id , name, longitude, latitude, border, unit_price, count, city_id, city_name) values
(#{item.id},#{item.name},#{item.longitude},#{item.latitude},#{item.border},#{item.unit_price},#{item.count},#{item.city_id},#{item.city_name})
